teacher_info.intro: Hello, my name is Melissa, but you can call me Mel! I am a young, enthusiastic ESL teacher from Johannesburg, South Africa. I am very passionate about teaching and would love to help you improve your confidence in English. I am a Law graduate, currently doing a Master's in Intellectual Property Law. I have a 120-hour TESOL Certificate. I have over two years’ teaching experience, teaching both children and adults. I am a very punctual and reliable individual, so my students never have to worry about me being late for class or not showing up at all.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, my name is Melissa, but you can call me Mel! I am a young, enthusiastic ESL teacher from Johannesburg, South Africa. I am very passionate about teaching and would love to help you improve your confidence in English. I am a Law graduate, currently doing a Master's in Intellectual Property Law. I have a 120-hour TESOL Certificate. I have over two years’ teaching experience, teaching both children and adults. I am a very punctual and reliable individual, so my students never have to worry about me being late for class or not showing up at all.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I believe that respect is the best policy, therefore I treat all of my students with respect. I am a very patient, kind, and approachable teacher. My students can feel free to be themselves and talk to me about anything. My goal as a teacher is to help improve all my students' confidence with English. I will be focusing on conversational English, Grammar, pronunciation, and English Fluency. I also have a Corporate background, therefore I can assist students with corporate-related needs such as (preparing for an interview, preparing for a presentation, or even going over a business plan).
teacher_info.teaching_style: Lessons with me are conversational. I believe that students learn best when they are free and comfortable to just be themselves. I understand that each student learns differently; therefore, my lessons are each structured differently, to suit each individual's unique set of needs. Do not be shy to make mistakes; in my class, mistakes are all part of the process. We can have a conversation about current affairs, travel, sport, food, entertainment, or anything that appeals to a student. In that way, I can pick up mistakes and help correct my students' pronunciation and fluency in English. My students can expect fun class quizzes and PowerPoint presentations.

exp_info.description: Academic Tutor, tutoring law students law related modules.
Online Tutor- tutoring high school subjects (Maths, English and Geography).

edu_info.description: Bachelor Degree in South African Law.

cert_info.description: 120-Hours TESOL Certificate which allows me to teach English to speakers of other languages. I learnt how to prepare lesson material, how to handle different student needs and how to create a productive learning environment.

course_info.trial_description: This is a lesson based on a general conversation where each student and I get to know each other, understand our goals and our lesson plans. Feel free to make mistakes, relax and just be yourself. I am here to help you improve your confidence, and reach all of your English goals.

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar Lessons (for all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: This is an English grammar lesson tailored for all levels. Each lesson will be structured to suit each individual students unique set of needs. You will have specialized class notes, and PowerPoint presentations, with the possibility of class quizzes and homework depending on each students preferences. The main goal is to see an improvement in each students grammar, pronunciation and overall English fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation Practice (for all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is fit for all levels, and is designed to help improve your confidence with English. We will have conversations about any topic which excites you. In that way I will be able to correct your mistakes, your pronunciation and ultimately help you reach your English goals. I can help you get ready for an interview, presentation or speech.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Beginners (boost your confidence with English)
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is aimed at improving the confidence of beginners. Feel free to make mistakes, it's all part of the process. This lesson is structured to suit each individual students unique set of needs. Homework, class quizzes and presentations are optional depending on each students preferences.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Kids🌈👩🏼‍🎓😊
pro_course_detail.description: This course is ideal for kids of all nationalities and all ages. This course begins with a fun conversation and educational games to assess the Child's level thereafter it will be followed by reading, PowerPoint presentations, grammar and vocabulary. The the aim of this course is to develop the Child's confidence in English, while learning in a very fun way! This will motivate the child to keep learning and inspire them to improve.😁 What are you waiting for? Book this lesson for your child today!!! 😇See you soon! 🐝

pro_course_detail.title: Business English👨🏽‍💻
pro_course_detail.description: Improve your English for the workplace and learn about business topics to help you work more effectively and make the most of career opportunities. Here you can find a wide variety of activities to develop your interview skills, write clear emails in English and learn about business topics and issues. Watch videos, listen to podcasts or read articles, then complete the specially designed tasks to help you understand the topic and use the language skills that you have learned.

私は2019年6月から、日本語を教えています。
日本語の会話をしながら、日本語を教えます。
今まで、中国人、台湾人、シンガポール人、韓国人、アメリカ人、イギリス人、フランス人、ドイツ人、スウェーデン人、バーレーン人、オーストラリア人、タイ人に日本語を教えたことがあります。

日本語の会話をしながら、文法や発音などを教えます😊



I have been teaching Japanese since June 2019.
I teach Japanese while having Japanese conversations.
I have taught Japanese to Chinese, Taiwanese, Singaporeans, Koreans, Americans, British, French, Germans, Swedes, Bahrainis, Australians and Thais.
"Japanese" and "the language of your country" are different.
While having a conversation in Japanese, I will teach you grammar and pronunciation 😊

日本語を勉強することは、一人でもできます。
ただ、会話は一人ではできません。一緒に楽しく会話をしましょう♪
勉強した日本語をたくさん使いましょう。
わからないことがあったら、どんどん質問をしてください。
楽しく会話をすることが、一番早く日本語を話せる方法です。


Studying Japanese can be done by yourself.
But you can't have a conversation alone. Let's have a fun conversation together♪
Let's use the Japanese that we have learned a lot.
If you don't understand something, keep asking questions.
Having a fun conversation is the fastest way to speak Japanese.

pro_course_detail.title: ★★楽しい日本語会話♪&たくさん質問をしよう！★★Let’s enjoy Japanese conversation ♪ & ask a lot of questions!
pro_course_detail.description:
私の授業は、日本語だけを使う「直接法」です。
もし、知らない言葉や難しい言葉があれば、
生徒に合わせた「やさしい日本語」で話します。

また、私の授業は「反転授業」で行います。
勉強は自分でしてください。
この授業は、あなたが作る授業です。

教科書（文法、発音など）

YouTube
ニュース
漫画・アニメ
ドラマ
歌
映画
これらを使って、勉強をしてください。

勉強をして、わからなかったことを私に質問してください。
質問（テキストか写真）を授業前に送るか、授業中に送ってください。
（漫画やドラマの会話の場合、前後の会話も教えてください。）

楽しく日本語を話しましょう♪
※italki classroomかSkypeでレッスン。Zoomではしてません

※「直接法」とは
外国人に日本語を教える時、
学習者の母語やその他の言語を使わずに、日本語だけで教える外国語教授法

※「やさしい日本語」とは
普通の日本語より簡単で、外国人にもわかりやすい日本語

※「反転授業」とは
授業前に、基本的な学習を行います。
授業中に、知識の定着や応用力に必要な学習を行う教育方法

〈キャンセルポリシー〉
レッスンをキャンセルする場合は、レッスン時間の24時間前までにお願いします。予定時刻の 24 時間以内にレッスンがキャンセルされた場合、返金は行われません。

In my lesson, I use "direct method" which uses only Japanese.
If there are words you don't know or difficult, I will speak in "Easy/Simple Japanese" tailored to the student.

Also, my lesson is based on "flipped learning".
Please study by yourself first by using the materials below.
This lesson is a lesson you make.

Textbook (Grammar, Pronunciation, etc.)
Workbook (Grammar, Kanji, etc.)
YouTube
News
Manga Anime
Drama
Song
Movies

Please study by yourself first and ask me what you didn't understand.
Please send me your questions (by text or photo) in advance or during the lesson.(For manga and drama conversations, please tell me the whole conversation not only a sentence or words.)

* What is the "direct method"?
Foreign language teaching method that is to teach only in Japanese without using the learner's mother tongue or other languages, when teaching Japanese to foreigners.

* What is "Easy/Simple Japanese"?
Japanese that is easier than ordinary Japanese and easy for foreigners to understand.

* What is "flipped learning"?
Basic learning has to be done before lessons.
An educational method that provides learning which is necessary for retaining  knowledge and applied skills during lessons.

〈Cancelation policy〉
Cancellation should be made at least 24 hours before the lesson time. If the lesson is cancelled less than 24 hours before the scheduled time, and no refund will be given.

My hobby is listening to music and watching Japanese anime and American drama, movies.
 Now, I am a second years university student. I am major in economics and I'm also learning English and Chinese.
So, we are a kind of peer sharing same goal!!

また、その際（さい）、日本語（にほんご）でわからないことがあれば説明（せつめい）していくといく形（かたち）で進（すす）めていきます。加（くわ）えて、日本語（にほんご）の文法（ぶんぽう）や単語（たんご）の意味（いみ）などについて深（ふか）く学（まな）びたいという方（かた）がいれば、それに集中（しゅうちゅう）した授業（じゅぎょう）も行（おこない）いたいと考（かんが）えています。
　また、もし授業（じゅぎょう）で使（つか）いたい教材等（きょうざい）ございましたら、事前（じぜん）に言（い）っていただければ、その教材（きょうざい）を元（もと）に授業（じゅぎょう）を進（すす）めていきます。

こちらでいくつかトピックを用意（ようい）しますが、他（ほか）のトピックでも大丈夫（だいじょうぶ）です。
文法（ぶんぽう）や語彙（ごい）に特化（とっか）した授業（じゅぎょう）は、事前（じぜん）に相談（そうだん）を頂（いただ）いた上（うえ）で、オリジナルの教材（きょうざい）などを配布（はいふ）したいと思います。

I've also had the opportunity to teach English to diverse groups of learners, ranging from beginners to advanced students. These experiences have honed my ability to tailor lessons to different proficiency levels and to address specific language challenges. As a tutor, I'm not just here to help you improve your English but also to share insights into the English-speaking world and foster cross-cultural understanding. I'm excited to connect with students from around the world and assist you in your language journey. Together, we can build your confidence.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversational Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Our conversational practice sessions are designed to simulate real-life situations, covering a wide range of topics including everyday conversations, professional settings, travel scenarios, and more. Through interactive discussions and role-playing exercises, you'll gain confidence in expressing your ideas, improving pronunciation, and expanding your vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English/ English For Work/ Preparation For Job Interviews
pro_course_detail.description:
Through tailored lessons, you'll learn how to effectively communicate in various business contexts such as meetings, presentations, negotiations, and email correspondence. Our experienced tutor will guide you in improving your vocabulary, polishing your grammar, and mastering the art of professional communication.

In addition to Business English, we also offer specialized courses in English for Work, focusing on industry-specific language and skills. Whether you're in finance, marketing, IT, or any other field, our program will help you confidently navigate workplace interactions and excel in your professional role.

Furthermore, if you're preparing for job interviews, our dedicated Job Interview Preparation course is here to assist you. Our training will provide you with valuable insights, conduct mock interviews, and offer personalized feedback to enhance your interview performance. You'll gain confidence in answering common interview questions, learn effective techniques to showcase your skills and experience, and develop a compelling personal brand.

pro_course_detail.title: English For Test Preparation (IELTS, TOEFL)
pro_course_detail.description: Our test preparation courses focus on all sections of the exam, including reading comprehension, writing, listening, speaking, and grammar. We offer targeted strategies, practice exercises, and simulated test scenarios to familiarize you with the format and content of the exam.

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar and Vocabulary
pro_course_detail.description:
In our vocabulary sessions, you'll learn new words, idiomatic expressions, and collocations through interactive exercises, contextual examples, and engaging activities. Our experienced tutors will guide you in understanding word usage, developing effective learning strategies, and incorporating new vocabulary into your everyday communication.

In addition to vocabulary, our grammar sessions will focus on strengthening your understanding of grammatical structures and rules. Through comprehensive explanations, practical examples, and targeted practice exercises, you'll refine your grammar accuracy and become more confident in your written and spoken English.

pro_course_detail.title: General English (Reading, Speaking and Writing)
pro_course_detail.description: Improve your reading and writing skills. Enhance comprehension, critical thinking, and written expression. Develop reading strategies, analyze texts, and improve vocabulary. Learn to craft well-structured essays and written forms. Receive personalized instruction and feedback to boost your skills. Gain confidence in reading complex texts and expressing ideas effectively in writing. Enroll now to unlock your potential in reading and writing.

pro_course_detail.description: Our Kids English program offers fun and interactive English learning for children. Engage in games, songs, and activities to develop listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. We ensure age-appropriate teaching and foster a love for learning languages. Enroll your child today and open doors to language proficiency and exciting opportunities.

When I was working in the hotels, I was already helping my clients and guests to learn Vietnamese for their business needs or just to make their vacations more pleasant and comfortable. 
For the past 3 years, I've been teaching many students,online and in person,the Vietnamese language and they hail from every part of the world, from the United States, to Europe, to here in Asia.Most of my students are able to communicate with me fluently (according to their needs and goals) in Vietnamese
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Don’t be shy when conversing with me in Vietnamese during our lessons. Our lessons are a safe place for you to speak and experiment without fear of ridicule. The best way to learn a language is to practice it, and when you have a mentor to kindly correct your mistakes and encourage you when you do well, the learning journey is so much more enjoyable. 
My students can talk about their daily life, their big life stories, or anything under the sun, and if they have difficulties expressing themselves, I gently nudge and prompt them with the suitable Vietnamese words and phrases. The idea is to get my students talking without fear and just get used to using Vietnamese in their conversations.

I'll use textbooks such as "Genki" and "Minna no Nihongo" according to the level, and various teaching materials that match the learning style. You can learn speaking, listening, grammar, natural expressions and more. You can learn how to write essays and techniques for interviews. Of course, you can also prepare for the JLPT exam. I look forward to sharing your favorite topics, such as Japanese culture and trip!

course_info.trial_description:
Let's start learning Japanese from this trial lesson! Just try me as your Japanese teacher! I'll do my best for you!! Enjoy for learning!!
こんにちは！
最初（さいしょ）にトライアル レッスンからはじめてみませんか？
私は先生としてたくさんの経験（けいけん）があります。今まで塾（じゅく）で日本語や英語を学生（がくせい）に教えてきました。
ここitalkiであなたと楽しく日本語のレッスンを始めたいです！一緒（いっしょ）にがんばりましょう♪

pro_course_detail.title: 会話（かいわ）練習　Free talk and conversation practice- and sometimes includes dialect
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's have a casual conversation where you can freely speak and practice natural expressions! I'll make sure to use appropriate and natural language so you can enjoy and learn from our conversation. I'll speak to you like a friend and, if you're interested, I can even teach you the Tohoku dialect. You can also practice conversations in formal or business situations if needed - all levels of Japanese learners are welcome! Don't be shy as I am an experienced teacher and will create a comfortable environment for you. So, let's start a conversation together! (*^.^*)

自由に話せるカジュアルな会話で、自然な表現を練習しましょう！ 会話を楽しんで学べるように、適切で自然な言葉を使用するようにします。 友達のように話しかけますし、興味があれば東北弁も教えます。 必要に応じて、フォーマルな場面やビジネスの場面での会話を練習することもできます - すべてのレベルの日本語学習者を歓迎します! 私は経験豊富な教師であり、あなたのために快適な環境を作りますので、恥ずかしがらないでください。 それでは、一緒に会話を始めましょう！ (*^.^*)

pro_course_detail.title: 先進的な日本語　Advanced Japanese（JLPT for N1,N2、作文添削、面接練習、討論、時事問題、日本文化などに関する悩みを聞きます。等）
pro_course_detail.description:
It's very useful this lesson if you are not a beginner. You can make sure your knowledge and improve through this lesson. I am be here for your confidence to be stronger.  I can help you teaching for JLPT,interview for recruit,to debate with a theme,business, speaking with informal and formal ...I can solve your questions being lay down in your brain. Of course we can practice using various materials. You can ask me anything freely. I'd love to support you from over 5 years experiences of teaching!! You'll be great feeling after each single lessons!! I also like give you a homework if you want, especially checking essays is fun!! Please contact me!!(*^^*)

こちらのレッスンでは、基本的日本語を話せる人がもっと上達したい時にお手伝いします。たとえば、このような人がこちらのレッスンに向いています。
・JLPT試験(N1,N2などの日本語検定試験に挑戦（ちょうせん）したい人
・現代の日本人的日常会話を習得（しゅうとく）したい人
・仕事や専門的分野で使える用語を学びたい人(面接やプレゼンテーションの練習なども)
・論文のチェックを受けたい人
・中度から高度な文法を学びたい人
・時事問題などについて討論したい人
・日本文化や日本人との関係について分からないことについて話したい　など
etc・・
もっとネイティブに近いレベルを目指していきましょう！わたしは塾での5年以上にわたる指導経験を活かしてあなたに素敵なレッスンを提供（ていきょう）します！たくさん間違って覚えていくことは大切です。楽しむことを忘れずにレッスンへ参加してくださいね♪(^^)

pro_course_detail.title: 基本的な日本語（文法、読み、聞く、話す）Basic Japanese,grammar, reading, listening, speaking,writing, and JLPT for N5-3pronunciation, etc)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, you will learn basic Japanese and grammar, and prepare for JLPT N5-N3. I provide lessons based on words and phrases that are commonly used in daily life, business and travel. Comprehensive study of grammar, reading, listening, speaking and correct pronunciation to master natural conversation. It will surely help you when reading books or watching movies too. Through this lesson I can help you gain more confidence in your acquired abilities. If you are interested, I can also introduce you to Japanese culture and the best places to travel.

このレッスンでは、基本的な日本語と文法を学び、JLPT N5-N3 の準備もできます。 日常生活やビジネス、旅行でよく使われる単語やフレーズをもとにレッスンを行っています。 文法、リーディング、リスニング、スピーキング、正しい発音を総合的に学び、自然な会話をマスターします。 本を読んだり、映画を見たりするときもきっと役に立ちます。 このレッスンを通じて、私はあなたが得た能力にもっと自信を持てるようにお手伝いします。 興味があれば、日本の文化や旅行に最適な場所も紹介できます。

- French: A1-A2
- Indonesian: A1-C2

- No parents in children's class.

- Students can reschedule (up to 24 hours of the class).

- informs me in less than 24 hours.
- is late or missing the class.


We should appreciate our time & effort.
Thank you for understanding.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
You can share to me your language learning journey and interests.
I'll customise the study plan, so you can achieve your goals.
Then we'll always study on your own phase.

We will:
- practise conversation
- discuss any topics to enrich your vocabularies
- play games
- use flash cards
- share organised Google Drive folder for materials
- "hack" the rigid education system with practical study
- enjoy the process that won't betray the result
- *for French: use practical textbooks, workbooks and
exercises by L'Institut Français
- HAVE FUN!

No matter hold old we are, learning language shouldn't be like a chore.
It should be fun and spark your passion, more and more.
See you in my class!

---

1.	Q: Which level is suitable for this lesson? 
A: This lesson is only for Conversational practice (A1-C2 Level), so it would be great if you have a certain level of pre-knowledge of Japanese to participate. 

2.	Q: What should I prepare for before our sessions? 
A: It would be great if you could let me know your current Japanese level and your learning goal before our session. You can also share anything you want to do with me in our upcoming session, e.g., conversational topics, questions, etc. 

3.	Q: What are we going to do in our class?
A: Upon your level and request, we will focus on Japanese conversations on different topics, from your daily life to business or advanced academic Japanese context. Free talk style is welcome; we often use helpful content, such as NHK Easy Japanese News or Youtube, to enhance our Japanese conversational skills with background knowledge to cover all different aspects dynamically. 

4.	Q: What can I get after the class?
A: Of course, all the multimedia materials we use in our class will belong to you. In addition, I will send you the notes for our session every time in a PDF file for your reference. Based on your current Japanese learning progress, I will also give you relevant learning materials to boost your Japanese learning.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Après avoir défini votre niveau, améliorer l'expression orale et/ou écrite sera mon but. Pour les personnes qui préparent un examen de DELP,DALP,TCF... ou toute autre exercice nous pratiqueront le français avec des exercices et documents. After defining your level, improving oral and/or written expression will be my goal.For people who are preparing for a, DALP, TCF exam... or any other exercise, we will practice French with exercises and documents.For discussions, the focus would be on pronunciation, general grammar rules, vocabulary...

course_info.trial_description:
Pour bien mener notre lesson, ces questions nous conduira à sa réussite :
- Qu'attendez vous à la fin de cette lesson ? Améliorer votre la lecture, l'écriture ou le langage de la langue Française ?
- Nous utiliserons quelques tests
- Cette classe de conversation sera orientée selon vos objectifs
- Matériels et méthodes : La première leçon est essentiellement faite pour définir le niveau de l'apprenant(e) et le situé dans une classe d'étude. Après cela, nous pourrions également discuter d'autres sujets que l'apprenant (e) désirera.
为了很好地进行我们的课程，这些问题将引导我们成功：
 - 这节课结束时你还在等什么？ 提高您的阅读、写作或法语语言水平？
 - 我们将使用一些测试
 - 该会话课程将根据您的目标进行
 - 材料和方法：第一课基本上是为了定义学习者 (e) 的水平并位于学习班级。 之后，我们还可以讨论学习者想要的其他主题。
Чтобы правильно провести урок, эти вопросы приведут нас к его успеху:
 - Чего вы ждете в конце этого урока?  Улучшить свое чтение, письмо или французский язык?
 - Мы будем использовать несколько тестов
 - Этот разговорный класс будет ориентирован в соответствии с вашими целями
 - Материалы и методы: первый урок в основном предназначен для определения уровня учащегося (е) и расположен в учебном классе.  После этого мы могли бы также обсудить другие темы, которые хочет ученик.

pro_course_detail.title: Practical and thematic conversation. ( beginner, intermediate and advanced)
pro_course_detail.description:
To properly conduct the conversation class, we will do the following:
 We will start with a presentation.  The presentation will allow us to get to know each other, to have a fluid chat.
 After that, we will determine the level of the learner so that we can continue their learning and avoid doing what they already know.  The continuation of the conversation class will be oriented according to the level of the learner.
 Depending on whether the learner is at a beginner, intermediate or advanced level, documents and research will be done to achieve these objectives.
  Discussing the learner's objective as well as his expectations and especially his satisfaction at the end of this conversation course is of paramount importance.
 Some examples of lessons: the alphabet, grammar, conjugation, vocabulary, phonetics...
 The use of documents such as image files, video files, quizzes... will be necessary.
 In order to achieve the learner's objectives, this course is intended to be interactive, fun and relaxed.  Your participation will be of great help for the success of this conversation course.
 After the lesson is over, the learner will leave a comment to give feedback on how the class went and rate the teaching I am on a 5 star scale.  How did he find the conversation class?  What were his impressions?
 To leave the comment, he must go to the settings section then my courses and there you will find an option to leave a comment.

pro_course_detail.title: Lessons of grammar, conjugation, vocabulary ... and correct your exercises.
pro_course_detail.description: During this course, I will help you to understand your lessons well through exercises. I will help you with your FLE, DELF exercises... If you did not understand this course given by another teacher than me, we would do it again. Please define your difficulties precisely so that we can solve them one by one.  Thank you and do not hesitate to book lessons.

teacher_info.intro:
I am a British native speaker who enjoys teaching English around the world. I like playing the piano, radio, podcasting and writing books about English Language and poetry.  

Speaking and writing well is very important for everyone. I have worked in Business English settings as well as presenting my own radio shows in various countries on national channels. I also do "voice over" work for TV and radio as a continuity presenter.

That makes me the perfect person to help you with issues around speaking, pronunciation and confidence. I also do IELTS coaching as well as supporting you with most exam types and correcting written work.
teacher_info.introduction: I want to empower you to speak English and I have many approaches to Teaching and Learning. We will meet on Skype to get to know each other and then we can decide what you need. I want to understand more about your life, your interests, your hobbies, your passions and more about you. Until we are comfortable with each other we will proceed slowly. From the beginning I want to encourage you always to speak English so your confidence will improve. As your confidence rises you will be much more able to communicate fluently. Lessons might involve daily reading in English, listening exercises, writing and a strong encouragement to "think in English". I'm excited about meeting you and to learn more about you and your life. Thankyou for looking at my profile. Best wishes to you. Joseph.
teacher_info.about_me:
I am a British native speaker who enjoys teaching English around the world. I like playing the piano, radio, podcasting and writing books about English Language and poetry.  

Speaking and writing well is very important for everyone. I have worked in Business English settings as well as presenting my own radio shows in various countries on national channels. I also do "voice over" work for TV and radio as a continuity presenter.

That makes me the perfect person to help you with issues around speaking, pronunciation and confidence. I also do IELTS coaching as well as supporting you with most exam types and correcting written work.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I can help you with things like:

1. Pronunciation,  Accent Reduction and Voice Coaching (I love that).
2. Exam Preparation for all ESOL Exams such as IELTS, FCE, B1, B2 and others.
3. Conversation Practice at your level such as life skills, movies, arts, jobs etc.
4. Business English
5. Best use of Grammar
6. Confidence and Empowerment
7. Introduction to UK life and culture
8. Vocabulary and document checking

 I want to empower your communication skills to the highest level possible.  I will be empowering you to work alone outside the class  by giving you daily exercises and written tasks to complete and return to me.

Together we can decide what you want as we get to know each other.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Together we can design your lessons and make them most productive.

Some people like talking, others prefer grammar. I try to make our lessons entertaining and fun. My aim is to take the conversations "higher" so that you can improve your vocabulary in written and verbal expression. 

I use my own books in the lessons which I have written to help you grow in your knowledge. I will give you these when you need them. 

I want to see you you speaking  with clarity and I will be encouraging you to speak the best at all times  by looking at your breathing, intonation and linking and blending your words.

Learning English should be enjoyable & it is important that you find meaning and motivation.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
Generally speaking I try to allow cancellations at short notice for regular students, provided this doesn´t happen regularly. New students should give at least 24 hours notice in accordance with the Italki guidelines. Any students who have been given permission to use "special discounts" by me will be required to pay for any cancellation at short notice. 

If you do not let me know that you cannot attend, even at short notice and I have to wait for you on skype, then I will ask you to pay for the lesson. 

During weeks where I  receive a high number of cancellations or reschedules at short notice, you may be asked to pay for any missed lessons.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I totally understand how learning a new language can be a bit challenging, as I'm currently in the process of learning Thai myself. 

But don't worry, i'm here to help you every step of the way.

As your English teacher, my goal is to make this journey as comfortable and enjoyable as possible for you.

You know, the best way to learn a language is by immersing yourself in it, just like how we naturally acquire our native language when we were kids.

So, we'll focus on having fun conversations and practicing with real-life scenarios. 

This approach will help you grasp the language faster and make you more confident in using it.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
If you have your eyes set on achieving a specific IELTS score, I'm here to guide you towards that target. 

We'll work on all the essential speaking skills. You'll be amazed at how much progress you'll make!

Let's not forget about job interviews! I can help you with interview coaching so you can nail those important Interviews and land your dream job. 

We'll work on effective communication, confidence-building, and presenting yourself in the best possible way.

So, don't hesitate to take that leap and start this language-learning adventure with me. 

Together, we'll make sure you reach your language goals!

Are you looking to improve your IELTS speaking skills and increase your chances of success on the exam? Look no further! As a seasoned IELTS tutor, I have helped many students achieve their desired scores in the speaking section. My classes are tailored to address the specific skills and techniques needed to excel on the test, and I offer personalised guidance and support to help you reach your goals.

In my classes, you'll learn how to:

- I will transcribe all of your answers and provide a corrected version in the lesson notes
- Improve your answer structure and coherence.
- Expand your vocabulary and use of idiomatic expressions.
- Confidently tackle difficult questions and uncommon topics.
- Use appropriate pacing, intonation, and stress.
- Use appropriate filler words and phrases to sound more natural.

You'll also have the opportunity to practice your speaking skills and receive valuable feedback to help you progress. In addition, I'll provide you with helpful resources and tips to prepare you for the exam and boost your confidence.

Don't let the IELTS speaking test prevent you from achieving your dreams. Sign up for my class today and let's work together to get you the score you need to succeed.

pro_course_detail.title: Job Interview - Expert Advice from a Former Senior Manager 👔
pro_course_detail.description:
As an experienced English teacher and former corporate manager, I understand the crucial role strong communication and presentation skills play in the professional world. That's why I'm excited to offer personalised job interview lessons designed to empower you for success in your specific career path.

In my tailored job interview classes, we go beyond general skills development and delve into the specific requirements of your target job. To ensure the utmost relevance, I request your CV/resume and the job description you're aiming for or interviewing for. Armed with this information, I create a customised interview experience that addresses the unique demands of your desired position.

Throughout our sessions, we'll focus on honing your language and communication abilities to effectively articulate your qualifications and accomplishments. We'll engage in mock interviews, providing you with valuable practice and realistic scenarios to enhance your performance. I'll offer guidance on how to present yourself in the best possible light, highlighting your strengths and aligning them with the job requirements.

In addition to our interactive sessions, I provide comprehensive notes and tips to supplement your learning. These resources serve as valuable references, allowing you to reinforce your understanding of effective interview techniques and strategies.

With my personalised guidance, expertise, and the tailored approach of our lessons, you'll gain the skills and confidence necessary to excel in your next job interview. Let's work together to ensure that you stand out as a top candidate and make a lasting impression on potential employers.
